questions.question_text: Which information does CDP supply from connected devices? (Choose three.)
How to configure dynamic ARP inspection on a VLAN?

discussion.content:
Router(config)# ip arp inspection vlan {vlan_ID | vlan_range}

 
Enables DAI on VLANs.

format is
Switch(config)# [ no ] spanning-tree vlan root primary [ diameter [ hello-time ]]

so eternal problem on ios what is command and what is keyword?
if You accept primary as part of the command then diameter may be a keyword.
B is ok (o r less wrong)

https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/switches/lan/catalyst4500/12-2/15-02SG/configuration/guide/config/spantree.html
